resources.string: This application enables the user to make audio or video call remotely. As such, it needs to access to camera, microphone and internet connection in order to function correctly.
This application requires all permissions to be granted in order to work properly.
The maximum number of reconnection has been reached. The application will be closed…
The application cannot receive any request without subscription. The application will be closed…
The device does not have any camera device. The application will be closed…
